meanings.sent1: She always vawnties about her achievements.
meanings.sent2: He tends to vawntie about his new car.
meanings.sent3: During the game, he would vawntie loudly after scoring a goal.
meanings.sent4: Her vawntie echoed through the room, drawing attention.
meanings.sent5: The way he vawntied made everyone roll their eyes.

meanings.definition: A show of pride or self-satisfaction
meanings.sent1: Her vawntie was evident in the way she walked.
meanings.sent2: The trophy on his shelf was a vawntie of his hard work.
meanings.sent3: His vawntie in his new haircut was amusing to his friends.
meanings.sent4: The peacock's colorful feathers were a natural vawntie.
meanings.sent5: The bright smile on her face was a vawntie of her happiness.

meanings.definition: A display of excessive pride or vanity
meanings.sent1: His constant vawntie annoyed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The elaborate mansion was a vawntie of the wealthy family.
meanings.sent3: The peacock's vawntie in its feathers made it strut around proudly.
meanings.sent4: Her vawntie was like a shining crown on her head.
meanings.sent5: The vawntie in his eyes was unmistakable as he looked in the mirror.
